meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>bright</kanji> <kanji>news</kanji> report is going to be one full of <vocabulary>good news</vocabulary>. A dark news report is probably bad news, but we only care about good news right now, don't we?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
